name: Head Of Saint Philip
description:
The Head of Saint Philip was paraded around Montemor-o-Novo, Portugal, once per year, along with his over talkative skull companion. Tired of the never ending chatter and seeing a beautiful she-skull, Saint Philip decides to get himself a body in order to find true love.

Head Of Saint Philip is a 3D fast-paced hidden object game, where the goal is to find the (randomly chosen) target body within a minute.

Click on the characters with the left mouse button to move around.

This game was created for the Castle Jam, set in Oficinas do Convento de São Francisco in Montemor-o-Novo. The action of the game occurs in a 3D recreation of this historical place.

Credits:
Carlos Carpetudo - 3D modelling / Textures
Helena Barreiros - 2D illustration / UI
João Eiras Antunes - Game Design / Programming
Tiago Marques - Game Design / Textures

Character Models were obtained in www.mixamo.com
